citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
There is no record that the IACUC has reviewed the active protocol since its approval in 2018. Annual review of activities
( protocols ) is important to maintain compliance and approve any amendments. The IACUC shall conduct continuing
reviews of activities covered by this subchapter at appropriate intervals as determined by the IACUC, but not less than
annually;
CORRECT BY : 11/14/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility employees and the registrant via a phone call and email.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(d)(5) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
There is no record that the  IACUC has  reviewed the active protocol since its approval in 2018. Annual review of activities 
( protocols ) is important to maintain compliance and approve any amendments. The IACUC shall conduct continuing 
reviews of activities covered by this subchapter at appropriate intervals as determined by the IACUC, but not less than 
annually; 
CORRECT BY : 11/14/2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility employees and the registrant via a phone call and email. 
 
End Section
